publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-415 Tommy Sheridan: Water Charging Schemes—That the Parliament endorses the recommendation of the Water Customer Consultation Panel’s report Principles of Charging for Water and Wastewater that "the current household charge reduction scheme for low income households should be extended beyond March 2004" and believes that such a scheme should be funded accordingly and extended with a view to expanding its scope to assist many more of those living in poverty.

S2M-415 Tommy Sheridan: Water Charging Schemes-That the Parliament endorses the recommendation of the Water Customer Consultation Panel's report Principles of Charging for Water and Wastewater that "the current household charge reduction scheme for low income households should be extended beyond March 2004" and believes that such a scheme should be funded accordingly and extended with a view to expanding its scope to assist many more of those living in poverty.
